title: sent mail not moving to sent folder
content: Outgong mail is sent but hangs on moving message to sent items folder. Someone posted a solution, but it was cryptic.
creator: garyisfinally

title: Google Mail has stopped working with OAuth
content: As of today, I can no longer using my Workspace accounts in Thunderbird. They have been set to OAuth forever but I guess Google changed the 2FA requirements today and I am locked out of receiving or sending mail from TBird. I have searched higha nd low and cannot find a contemporary solution. Any thoughts/fixes???
creator: dsooley

title: Thunderbird UI temporarily blanking all messages in a folder
content: Using Thunderbird 128.9.0esr (64-bit) in Win11. Occasionally when deleting emails from any folder, the contents of the folder completely disappear upon deleting the email. The messages all come back after restarting Tbird. It's difficult to reproduce on demand.
creator: brown.steve89

title: Downloaded the latest version today and I cannot download or upload.
content: I downloaded the latest version today April 3 and now I cannot download or upload.
creator: burropilot

title: Flexibly organize Thunderbird mail
content: I am managing large amounts of Thunderbird mail and would like to be able to flexibly organize it by topic, sender, or perhaps other criteria in order spend less time on admin and more on content. The model I have in mind is that found on an Xperia tablet.
creator: adambogacki

email to johnf.brindle@gmail.com

title: Sending emails
content:
Hello, I cannot send emails. Thunderbird ask me to my password but that is not the saved constellation. Also I get information that the SMTP server is not available. This all started after switching my line from Vodafone to fiber optic from Telekom and therefore reinstalling my router.

Best regards, Alexandra
creator: koenig.alexandra

title: ERROR 400 van Google belet verbinding TB met Gmail
content: Sinds ik een nieuw paswoord heb aangemaakt bij Google, weigert Thunderbird me te verbinden met mijn gmail-account. Ik heb de jongste versie van Thunderbird en een nieuw account aangemaakt, maar bij het inloggen bij Google loop ik steevast na "Volgende" op een melding "400. Dat is een fout. De server kan het verzoek niet verwerken omdat dit niet de juiste opmaak heeft. Probeer het verzoek niet opnieuw. Dat is alles wat we weten." Hoe kan ik de verbinding wel maken?
creator: evd1946

title: NON  POSSO  INVIARE  EMAIL  CON  ALLEGATI
creator: 38go19

title: No send/new mail button to invoke the mail composer found on the UI ?
content:
I may be blind...., but I cant find a send mail or new mail to invoke the mail composer...

Using the Thunderbird beta

There is a shortcut available - well and good, and if the menu is selected, a new mail menu item on the dropdown also allow you to invoke the composer with your mouse

But I don't see a friendly (preferably large and prominent) create new mail button anywhere ???

Rgds Claus
creator: claus38
